Identity.History: Worked in lancer/archer cavalry pairs for much of Assyria's timeframe, but later became more tactically proficient, multi-talented, self-sufficient, self-contained, and mobile due in part to improved cavalry methods, training, organization, and equipment.
Identity.Tooltip: Rapid shock attacks; should wield spear overarm-style. Special: Can rank up to the elite Royal Bodyguard Cavalry once gained enough experience. Trained at the Civ Centre and Cavalry Stables.
